definitions.title: vb. Niph.
definitions.body: burst or break out, of tumours (Ar. 4atara have inverted, or cracked, eyelids, or lower lips; Eth. 3atara: lacerate; As. [šatâru] II. tear down; Syr. star destroy, so Sab. [[שתר]] Sab. Denkm.:No. 48, 1. 2, BAram. [[סְתַר]] Ezr 5:12);—

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Impf. [[וַיִּשָּֽׂתְרוּ לָהֶס עפלים]] 1Sa 5:9 and tumours brake out to them.
